title: Cabin Fever

actors: Dakota Fanning, Keith David, Jennifer Saunders, John Hodgman

title: Corbin Nash
description: After discovering that he hails from a long line of demon hunters, Corbin Nash heads to Los Angeles and battles two brutal, bloodthirsty vampires.
actors: Dean S. Jagger, Corey Feldman, Malcolm McDowell, Rutger Hauer

title: Corporate
description: A food company executive opens the door to a flurry of intrigue and manipulation whens she steals secrets from a corporate rival.
actors: Bipasha Basu, Kay Kay Menon, Raj Babbar, Rajat Kapoor

title: Countdown to Death: Pablo Escobar
description: Through rare interviews, images and wiretap audio, this documentary reconstructs the last nine years of Colombian drug lord Pablo Escobar's life.

title: Counterpunch
description: As boxing's popularity wanes, three fighters at different stages of their career make sacrifices to pursue their dreams of becoming champions.

title: Country Crush
description: A city girl falls for a country boy who follows her to New York, but their romance may be over when she must choose between love and a music career.
actors: Jana Kramer, Munro Chambers, Madeline Merlo, Sophie Simmons

title: Couple of Days
description: Three couples, each in different phases of romance, head to Ibadan for a fun and frisky holiday. But secrets soon spill, causing trouble in paradise.
actors: Lilian Esoro, Ademola Adedoyin, Enyima Nwigwe, Kiki Omeili

title: Couples Counseling
description: A seasoned couples therapist comes to realize she might need help with her own marriage after meeting a new pair of young clients.
actors: Zezé Polessa, Daniel Dantas, Paulo Vilhena, Fernanda Paes Leme

title: Cowboy
description: Frustrated by his meager career, an Argentinian actor goes all out to land a plum role in an American Western that's being filmed in his country.
actors: Leonardo Sbaraglia, Pilar Gamboa, Daniel Fanego, Guillermo Arengo

title: Cowboys
description: When a teenager from eastern France runs away with her Muslim boyfriend, her father and brother go on a years-long, obsessive quest to find her.
actors: François Damiens, Finnegan Oldfield, John C. Reilly, Agathe Dronne

title: Creep
description: When a cash-strapped videographer takes a job in a remote mountain town, he finds that the client has some unsettling ideas in mind.
actors: Mark Duplass, Patrick Brice

title: Creep 2
description: A video artist finds the perfect character for a sensational piece, but the subject of her dreams soon reveals his insidious side.
actors: Mark Duplass, Desiree Akhavan, Karan Soni

title: Crossroads: One Two Jaga
description: In Kuala Lumpur, an abused domestic worker tries to escape to Indonesia, while an idealistic cop insists on fighting corruption  -- at a heavy price.
actors: Zahiril Adzim, Ario Bayu, Asmara Abigail, Rosdeen Suboh

title: Crouching Tiger, Hidden Dragon: Sword of Destiny
description: Renowned warrior Yu Shu-Lien comes out of retirement to keep the legendary Green Destiny sword away from villainous warlord Hades Dai.
actors: Michelle Yeoh, Donnie Yen, Harry Shum Jr., Natasha Liu Bordizzo

title: Cult of Chucky
description: Following a string of murders in the asylum where she's confined, Nica Pierce begins to wonder whether Chucky is real after all.
actors: Fiona Dourif, Michael Therriault, Adam Hurtig, Alex Vincent

title: Curious George: A Very Monkey Christmas
description: George and the Man in the Yellow Hat are having a merry time counting down to Christmas, but neither can decide what present to give each other.
actors: Frank Welker, Jeff Bennett, Rolonda Watts, Jim Cummings

title: Curve
description: A young bride-to-be trying to shake a sadistic hitchhiker drives her truck off the road and ends up in a harrowing fight for survival.
actors: Julianne Hough, Teddy Sears, Penelope Mitchell, Madalyn Horcher

title: Cut from a Different Cloth
description: This firsthand look at a unique collaboration follows fashion empire Superdry's founders as they work with actor Idris Elba to launch a clothing line.
actors: Idris Elba

title: Cute to Killer
description: In this wildlife documentary, cameras capture two years in the lives of four lion cubs as they develop from newborns into savvy jungle predators.
actors: Dave Birch
